title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Ubiquitous Social Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Social science analytical methodologies and basic proficiency in mobile app usage
context.additional_context: Context-based learning using simulation/VR in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, with enhanced job-readiness training for job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners can collect context-specific learning data using mobile devices in VR simulation environments of various social settings.
Learners can develop educational scenarios using a mobile app design framework based on ubiquitous learning theory.
Learners can propose solutions to social problems and incorporate peer assessment feedback using simulation tools accessible in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
